languages.text: {n}Вы различаете разные детали конструкции — стандартную для имперских колоний антенну дальнего действия, {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g}, эльдарский маячок, и еще с полдюжины устройств разного происхождения. Все их объединяет одно — эта техника предназначена передавать в ближний космос простые сигналы, чаще всего — просьбу о помощи или идентификатор крушения корабля.{/n}

{n}You identify a number of elements of the structure — the long-range antenna of a design standard for Imperial colonies, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, the Aeldari beacon, and half a dozen other devices of varied origin. They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to neighbouring space, the most common being requests for assistance and ship distress codes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы различаете разные детали конструкции — стандартную для имперских колоний антенну дальнего действия, {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g}, эльдарский маячок, и еще с полдюжины устройств разного происхождения. Все их объединяет одно — эта техника предназначена передавать в ближний космос простые сигналы, чаще всего — просьбу о помощи или идентификатор крушения корабля.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You identify a number of elements of the structure — the long-range antenna of a design standard for Imperial colonies, the cogitator, the Eldar beacon, and half a dozen other devices of various origin. They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to the neighboring space, most commonly help requests and the identification codes of a ship in distress.{/n}

{n}You identify a number of elements of the structure — the long-range antenna of a design standard for Imperial colonies, the cogitator, the Eldar beacon, and half a dozen other devices of various origin. They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to the neighboring space, most commonly help requests and the identification codes of a ship in distress.{/n}

They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to neighboring space, the most common being requests for assistance and ship distress codes.{/n}

They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to neighboring space, the most common being requests for assistance and ship distress codes.{/n}

{n}You identify a number of elements of the structure — the long-range antenna of a design standard for Imperial colonies, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, the Aeldari beacon, and half a dozen other devices of varied origin. They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to neighbouring space, the most common being requests for assistance and ship distress codes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你认出了这台装置的一部分零件，包括为帝国殖民地专门设计的制式远程天线、{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}、灵族信标，以及其他各种各样来自不同种族的设备。这些设备有个共同点——它们都是用来向邻近的太空区域传输基础信号的。最常见的用途便是用来请求援助，或是发送舰船遇险代码。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify a number of elements of the structure — the long-range antenna of a design standard for Imperial colonies, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, the Aeldari beacon, and half a dozen other devices of varied origin. They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to neighbouring space, the most common being requests for assistance and ship distress codes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你认出了这台装置的一部分零件，包括为帝国殖民地专门设计的制式远程天线、{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}、灵族信标，以及其他各种各样来自不同种族的设备。这些设备有个共同点——它们都是用来向邻近的太空区域传输基础信号的。最常见的用途便是用来请求援助，或是发送舰船遇险代码。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Identificas varios elementos de la estructura: la antena de largo alcance de diseño estándar en colonias imperiales, el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}, la baliza Aeldari y media docena de dispositivos de orígenes muy variados. Todos tienen una cosa en común: la tecnología está diseñada para enviar señales al espacio cercano, por lo general señales de socorro y códigos de emergencia de naves.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify a number of elements of the structure — the long-range antenna of a design standard for Imperial colonies, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, the Aeldari beacon, and half a dozen other devices of varied origin. They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to neighbouring space, the most common being requests for assistance and ship distress codes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Identificas varios elementos de la estructura: la antena de largo alcance de diseño estándar en colonias imperiales, el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g}, la baliza Aeldari y media docena de dispositivos de orígenes muy variados. Todos tienen una cosa en común: la tecnología está diseñada para enviar señales al espacio cercano, por lo general señales de socorro y códigos de emergencia de naves.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは、帝国植民地の設計標準に則った長距離アンテナ、{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}、アエルダリのビーコン、そして、さまざまな起源を持つその他6個の装置など、構造物の多くの要素を特定していく。これらには1つの共通点がある。その技術が基本的な信号を近隣の宇宙空間へと発信するよう設計されているという点であり、それは最も一般的な信号は援助要請や船の遭難信号である。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify a number of elements of the structure — the long-range antenna of a design standard for Imperial colonies, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, the Aeldari beacon, and half a dozen other devices of varied origin. They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to neighbouring space, the most common being requests for assistance and ship distress codes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは、帝国植民地の設計標準に則った長距離アンテナ、{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}、アエルダリのビーコン、そして、さまざまな起源を持つその他6個の装置など、構造物の多くの要素を特定していく。これらには1つの共通点がある。その技術が基本的な信号を近隣の宇宙空間へと発信するよう設計されているという点であり、それは最も一般的な信号は援助要請や船の遭難信号である。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du identifizierst mehrere Elemente der Struktur – die Langstreckenantenne im Standarddesign für imperiale Kolonien, den {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}, das Aeldari-Signal und ein halbes Dutzend anderer Geräte unterschiedlicher Herkunft. Sie alle haben eins gemeinsam – die Tech soll einfache Signale wie Unterstützungsanfragen oder Notrufe von Schiffen in den benachbarten Raum übertragen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify a number of elements of the structure — the long-range antenna of a design standard for Imperial colonies, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, the Aeldari beacon, and half a dozen other devices of varied origin. They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to neighbouring space, the most common being requests for assistance and ship distress codes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du identifizierst mehrere Elemente der Struktur – die Langstreckenantenne im Standarddesign für imperiale Kolonien, den {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g}, das Aeldari-Signal und halbes Dutzend anderer Geräte unterschiedlicher Herkunft. Sie alle haben eins gemeinsam – die Tech soll einfache Signale wie Unterstützungsanfragen oder Notrufe von Schiffen in den benachbarten Raum übertragen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous identifiez un certain nombre d'éléments de la structure : une antenne longue-portée de conception standard dans les colonies impériales, le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g}, une balise aeldari et une demi-douzaine d'autres appareils d'origines variées. Ils ont tous un point commun : leur capacité à envoyer des messages rudimentaires dans l'espace voisin, principalement les demandes d'assistance et les signaux de détresse des vaisseaux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify a number of elements of the structure — the long-range antenna of a design standard for Imperial colonies, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, the Aeldari beacon, and half a dozen other devices of varied origin. They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to neighbouring space, the most common being requests for assistance and ship distress codes.{/n}

Ils ont tous un point commun : leur capacité à envoyer des messages rudimentaires dans l'espace voisin, principalement les demandes d'assistance et les signaux de détresse des vaisseaux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yapının pek çok unsurunu tespit ediyorsun: İmparatorluk kolonileri için standart tasarıma sahip ve uzun menzilli bir anten, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayar{/g}, bir Aeldari parıldağı ve de çeşitli menşeli üç beş cihaz daha. Hepsinin tek bir ortak noktası var: Bu teknolojiler, uzayda yakınlara basit sinyaller iletmek üzere tasarlanmış. Bu sinyallerin en yaygın olanları da yardım talepleri ve gemilerin imdat çağrıları.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You identify a number of elements of the structure — the long-range antenna of a design standard for Imperial colonies, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, the Aeldari beacon, and half a dozen other devices of varied origin. They all have one thing in common — this tech is designed to transmit basic signals to neighbouring space, the most common being requests for assistance and ship distress codes.{/n}
